enWisdom: The self-admiring one has no intelligence

Wisdom: إِعْجَابُ الْمَرْءِ بِنَفْسِهِ بُرْهَانُ نَقْصِهِ وَعُنْوَانُ ضَعْفِ عَقْلِهِ
enWisdom: The self-admiration of a person is proof of his deficiency and a symbol of his weak intellect

Wisdom: مَنْ أَعْجَبَهُ قَوْلُهُ فَقَدْ غَرَبَ عَقْلُهُ
enWisdom: One who admires his [own] speech, his intellect has departed
Whoever is proud [and pleased] with his action, his intellect gets afflicted
No one admires his own opinion except the ignorant one
